comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

I minimized Firefox with 3 tabs open and then attempted to maximize it again to open a new tab. 


Actual results:

Firefox froze my whole computer for a while and then finally started to work, after I had closed almost every other program in the background. 


Expected results:

It should have just opened and let me open a new tab with minimal to no freezing.
comments.creator: ruaoviyena@gmail.com

Steps to reproduce:

I minimized Firefox with 3 tabs open and then attempted to maximize it again to open a new tab. 


Actual results:

Firefox froze my whole computer for a while and then finally started to work, after I had closed almost every other program in the background. 


Expected results:

comments.creator: ruaoviyena@gmail.com
comments.text: I also had pages, text edit, and yahoo messenger running in the background when I tried to open it.
